column7: got a pro...       blem...       The weather's getting cold...
northern wind blows sharp & swift my jackets worn and  old
all  I  need  to   know  is  in  the  tales my poppa   told
choose a pelt that thick and warm... measure twice and chalk my form
cut and stitch 'ere com-ing   sto-o-orm...
safe and snug
got a pro...       blem...       It seems I lost my way...
journeyed forth to lands unknown been wandering all day
need  some  help.  Can I recall what  did  my  momma say?
lift my eyes up   past the air.     Follow the tail of Greater Bear
see that north  is over there...
homeward bound
got a pro...       blem...       What if this lore's not true?
if what worked in days of old don't work for me and you?
don't despair  I  got a plan; what grampa said to   do!
check the facts with my own eyes I  do the math, I analyze
get a p less than 0h five
problem's solved
got a pro...       blem...       Results won't replicate!
garden full of    forking paths, the choice to speak too late
Can Sol'monoff quite help me here? Do I, um, hang out, wait...
I... I got a problem.
